scripts.prepare: nuxt prepare && mkdir -p storyblok/types && mkcert localhost
scripts.predev: storyblok login && storyblok pull-components --space=$(grep 'STORYBLOK_SPACE_ID=' .env | cut -d '=' -f 2-) && storyblok-generate-ts source=./components.$(grep 'STORYBLOK_SPACE_ID=' .env | cut -d '=' -f 2-).json target=storyblok/types/component-types-sb
scripts.predev:https: storyblok login && storyblok pull-components --space=$(grep 'STORYBLOK_SPACE_ID=' .env | cut -d '=' -f 2-) && storyblok-generate-ts source=./components.$(grep 'STORYBLOK_SPACE_ID=' .env | cut -d '=' -f 2-).json target=storyblok/types/component-types-sb
